hotels.title: Contemporary Central Albury Escape Moments from Botanic Gardens with Onsite Restaurant
hotels.description: Experience the allure of this stunning hotel, perfectly positioned in the heart of Albury's city centre. This contemporary hotel is a stone's throw from the Murray Art Museum Albury, where local and international artists showcase their work, and the leafy surrounds of the Albury Botanic Gardens. Indulge in a sumptuous meal at the onsite restaurant, District Dining, celebrating regional produce and wines, or explore the nearby Dean Street for a taste of Albury's vibrant dining scene. Venture further to Lake Hume for a day of water sports or a leisurely picnic by the water's edge.
